# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Automatically generated by the script oomph_generate_cmake_script

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16..3.20 FATAL_ERROR)
project(quadratic_vmtk_tetgen C CXX Fortran)
find_package(oomphlib REQUIRED)
include(CTest)

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME snap_mesh
  SOURCES snap_mesh.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::mesh_smoothing oomph::solid oomph::constitutive
            oomph::navier_stokes oomph::poisson oomph::linear_elasticity
  CXX_STANDARD 14)

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME xda_to_poly_fsi
  SOURCES xda_to_poly_fsi.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::generic
  CXX_STANDARD 14)

# ---------------------------------- TESTING ----------------------------------

oomph_add_test(
  TEST_NAME meshing.quadratic_vmtk_tetgen
  TARGET_DEPENDENCIES snap_mesh xda_to_poly_fsi
  EXTRA_REQUIRES short_coarse_mesh_files
  LABELS "meshing;quadratic_vmtk_tetgen")

# This test needs more than the default allotted time to complete
set_tests_properties(meshing.quadratic_vmtk_tetgen PROPERTIES TIMEOUT 10000)

# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
